problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({4x-6}/{9}={1}/{7}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({4x-6}/{9}*9={1}/{7}*9\)

Simplify:
\(4x-6={9}/{7}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(4x ={9}/{7}+6\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(4x ={9}/{7}+{42}/{7}\)
\(4x ={51}/{7}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={51}/{28}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

\(-2x ={85}/{7}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={85}/{-14}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({9x+10}/{8}={-1}/{2}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({9x+10}/{8}*8={-1}/{2}*8\)

Simplify:
\(9x+10={-8}/{2}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(9x ={-8}/{2}-10\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(9x ={-8}/{2}+{-20}/{2}\)
\(9x ={-28}/{2}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={-28}/{18}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:

\({-4x-7}/{-7}={-4}/{-9}\)
problemsArray.explanation:

Combine into common denominator:
\(-4x ={28}/{-9}+{-63}/{-9}\)
\(-4x ={-35}/{-9}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={-35}/{36}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({-3x+6}/{5}={-2}/{6}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({-3x+6}/{5}*5={-2}/{6}*5\)

Simplify:
\(-3x+6={-10}/{6}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(-3x ={-10}/{6}-6\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(-3x ={-10}/{6}+{-36}/{6}\)
\(-3x ={-46}/{6}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={-46}/{-18}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({-5x-6}/{-4}={3}/{1}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({-5x-6}/{-4}*-4={3}/{1}*-4\)

Simplify:
\(-5x-6={-12}/{1}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(-5x ={-12}/{1}+6\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(-5x ={-12}/{1}+{6}/{1}\)
\(-5x ={-6}/{1}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={-6}/{-5}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({5x+9}/{1}={-4}/{-1}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({5x+9}/{1}*1={-4}/{-1}*1\)

Simplify:
\(5x+9={-4}/{-1}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(5x ={-4}/{-1}-9\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(5x ={-4}/{-1}+{9}/{-1}\)
\(5x ={5}/{-1}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={5}/{-5}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:
Solve for x: 
\({-4x-7}/{-8}={-5}/{-5}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Multiply by left denominator on each side:
\({-4x-7}/{-8}*-8={-5}/{-5}*-8\)

Simplify:
\(-4x-7={40}/{-5}\)

Isolate the variable:
\(-4x ={40}/{-5}+7\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(-4x ={40}/{-5}+{-35}/{-5}\)
\(-4x ={5}/{-5}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={5}/{20}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:

problemsArray.explanation:

Simplify:

Isolate the variable:
\(8x ={12}/{4}-7\)

Combine into common denominator:
\(8x ={12}/{4}+{-28}/{4}\)
\(8x ={-16}/{4}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={-16}/{32}\)

Reduce to lowest terms:

problemsArray.question:

\(-10x ={93}/{-1}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={93}/{10}\)

Divide by the coefficient of x on both sides:
\(x ={32}/{-24}\)
